metadata.title: CVE-2021-37990 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in WebView in Google Chrome on Android priorto 95.0.4638.54 allowed a remote attacker to leak cross-origin data via acrafted app.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
